google_translated: Ryoko-chan is not me to be more straightforward

en_text: Then no dinner for you.
jp_text: {\a6}森野君はなんですの　何かあったでしょう
google_translated: Morino You would have something

en_text: Give it back! It's my hamburger!
jp_text: 返せ　俺のハンバーグ
google_translated: Return my hamburger

en_text: A lot of things happened in the past, but Ookami-san cheered up, just a bit.
jp_text: {\a6}過去は色々あるけれど
google_translated: There are many things in the past

en_text: Just tell me!
jp_text: 駄目　さっさと白状しなさいですの
google_translated: It is easy to do with me

en_text: It'll get cold!
jp_text: 早くしないと　冷めちゃいますのよ
google_translated: It's cold if you don't go fast
